Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.AggregatePublisher.useCursor​(Boolean)
    There is no replacement for this. Applications can assume that the driver will use a cursor for server versions that support it (>= 2.6). The driver will ignore this as of MongoDB 3.6, which does not support inline results for the aggregate command.
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.FindPublisher.maxScan​(long)
    Deprecated as of MongoDB 4.0 release
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.FindPublisher.modifiers​(Bson)
    use the individual setters instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.FindPublisher.snapshot​(boolean)
    Deprecated in MongoDB 3.6 release and removed in MongoDB 4.0 release
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoClient.getSettings()
    this method is being removed
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoClients.create​(MongoClientSettings)
    use MongoClients.create(com.mongodb.MongoClientSettings) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.count()
    use MongoCollection.countDocuments() or MongoCollection.estimatedDocumentCount() instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.replaceOne​(Bson, TDocument, UpdateOptions)
    Prefer MongoCollection.replaceOne(Bson, Object, ReplaceOptions)
